Electrifying, from the inside out.

Try out the all-electric BMW i3 at our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road today!

1.post_text:
Performance Motors celebrates its 35th anniversary and the season of giving with a selection of exclusive offers. Don’t miss the perfect time to purchase a BMW 3 Series or BMW 4 Series. 

Enjoy preferential rates on BMW 420i Gran Coupé programme cars. Or with Performance Direct, have the flexibility of driving one home at $2,888/month with zero down payment, while enjoying 50% off your first month’s payment. 

In addition, with every purchase of a BMW 3 Series, BMW 4 Series and other selected models, you can choose from one of four fabulous wishes and we will make it come true.

For more details about exclusive offers on selected BMW models, visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8052 for a test drive.

2.post_text:
Fancy these little masterpieces?

Whether you display them on your desk or in your home - or even use the ones with driving function outside - these miniature models will make collectors as happy as casual admirers.

Visit 303 Alexandra Road for more.

3.post_text:
Three of a kind.

The BMW i3 with eDrive redefines sustainable mobility. Experience it today at 303 Alexandra Road.

4.post_text:
It's time to rejoice this merry season with exceptional festive promotions on selected merchandise exclusive to Performance Motors.

Looking for a Christmas gift? Find out more at our showroom today. While stocks last.

5.post_text: Space and comfort, style and elegance: the new BMW 2 Series Active Tourer combines BMW dynamics with today’s mobility requirements.

6.post_text:
The doors to the future are wide open.

The BMW i8 unites the best of both worlds – and offers sporty driving performances with low consumption and emission figures.

Check out the all-new BMW i8 at our showroom today.

7.post_text:
The best way to create the future is to predict it.

Did you know that the BMW i8 revolutionise automotive engineering with its extremely lightweight carbon fibre body?

8.post_text:
The BMW 4 Series impresses with powerful aesthetics, impressive athleticism and exceptional driving dynamics.

Experience it for yourself at our showroom today.

9.post_text:
This holiday, experience the joy of sheer driving pleasure with the sporty and adventurous BMW X models or the breathtaking performance of the stunning BMW 5 Series.

Performance Motors celebrates its 35th anniversary and the season of giving with a selection of exclusive offers. With every purchase of a BMW X model, BMW 5 Series and a range of other BMW models*, you can choose from one of four fabulous wishes and we will make it come true.

Wish 1: More Thrills
Enjoy a complimentary BMW Driving Experience (Advanced) and direct membership for our flagship Performance Motorsports Circle that gives you exclusive invites to events and more.

Wish 2: Maritime Adventure 
Sail the seas in style with a 5-hour luxury yacht experience.

Wish 3: Go Further
Free fuel to power your drive.

Wish 4: Smoother Ride
Keep your engine running smoothly with a complimentary Performance Motors Engine Oil Package.

For more details about exclusive offers on selected BMW models, visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8052 for a test drive.

comments.message: Great car! Green idea! But what discouraging LTA we have! Slapping $1700 a year road tax on a 0 cc car!

10.post_text: Start every morning right with the all-electric BMW i3, the future of urban mobility that gives you the next-generation driving pleasure!

All looks lovely, only if they are like phone covers - change to suit our mood.

13.post_text:
Bird's-eye view: which nest would you head for?

Visit our showroom at 303 Alexandra Road and feast your eyes on the new BMW i8, the most progressive sports car by BMW to date!

14.post_text: Did you take part in our BMW Driving Experience - Intensive Programme on 9 November? If you did, we hope you enjoyed the one-day course picking up tips and tricks such as reverse flick and drifting in a circle at the Johor Circuit in Pasir Gudang!

comments.message: Looks Fun! Prem Roy if you come across an event like that lemme know :)

14.story: BMW Singapore is at Johor Circuit.

15.post_text:
Who says you can’t play golf, cycle and have a picnic with the family all on the same weekend? With back seats that fold flat for added interior capacity, the BMW 2 Series Active Tourer has space for every need. It combines flexible comfort with typical BMW performance and efficiency, making it the perfect companion for whatever you are up to. Question is, what are you going to do with it?

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 2646 to reserve your test drive today.

16.post_text: See you tomorrow from 11.00am to 2.30pm along Greenwood Ave if you did not manage to catch our BMW i3 roving test drives today!

23.post_text:
Ever wondered what a day in the life of a BMW i Product Genius is like? Watch this video to find out more.

Curious about a BMW i3 feature you've never experienced? Share your questions in the comments below and you might be the lucky one to receive a personalised video reply from our Product Genius. #askagenius

comments.message: I applied.. No response even.. I have the qualifications and definitely have the knowledge of BMW products.. I've even "sold" BMW cars to my friends by taking them through BMW products.. Well, I'll just say that not recognising good talent is a loss to an organisation..
What qualifications to be a product genius?
